crossBorderModal.title: Cross-border Services Restrictions
crossBorderModal.paragraph1: You are attempting to access our website from an IP address outside of Hong Kong.
crossBorderModal.paragraph2: Please be aware that promoting or distributing our products or services outside of Hong Kong may require a specific license. The content of this website is intended solely for Hong Kong residents who are domiciled in Hong Kong.
crossBorderModal.paragraph3: If you are a resident outside of Hong Kong and do not wish to proceed, kindly close this page. By clicking "Continue," you confirm that you have read and understood the above statement and that you are accessing this website on your own initiative, without any active promotion or solicitation from Okami Project.

whoWeAre.title: WHO WE ARE
whoWeAre.subtitle: About Us
whoWeAre.heading1:
Creating a World Where
Everyone Lives Doing What They Love
With Smiles on Their Faces
whoWeAre.paragraph1: We believe that by living each day with passion, we can achieve both self-realization and social contribution.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: We continue to challenge ourselves daily to create a world where everyone can work authentically.
whoWeAre.paragraph3: Through the Okami Project, we help create a better society by establishing a fund to save animals from euthanasia, which is said to number 11,000 annually, or by partnering with and supporting animal protection organizations.
whoWeAre.paragraph4: Specifically, a portion of Okami Coin used as transactions when using the Okami Card will be utilized for social contribution activities.

projects.title: OKAMI PROJECTS
projects.subtitle: Okami Project
projects.heading:
Making Everyone Happy
Through OKAMI PROJECT
projects.paragraph:
This means that by using the card
and holding Okami Coin,
you are contributing to society.

osada.name: Tadachiyo Osada
osada.bio:
Born October 1956
Became Managing Executive Officer of MUFG Bank, Japan's largest megabank, in 2010, and was appointed Representative Director of the same bank in 2012.
 He led retail operations for the entire MUFG Group, including MUFG Bank, overseeing consumer finance businesses including credit card operations at group companies such as MUFG NICOS.
 He also has a deep interest in cutting-edge fields such as AI and Web 3.0, serving as a director of the Metaverse Promotion Council and the Generative AI Utilization and Promotion Association.

kiuchi.name: Masatane Kiuchi
kiuchi.bio:
Born October 1964. Born as the great-great-grandson of Yataro Iwasaki, the founder of Mitsubishi Corporation, Japan's largest conglomerate group, Masatane Kiuchi himself joined Mitsubishi Corporation.
 He continues to serve as an active executive at Mitsubishi Corporation. Eiichi Shibusawa, the founder of Japan's first bank, "The First National Bank," is Masatane Kiuchi's great-grandfather.

mochizuki.name: Kousei Mochizuki
mochizuki.bio:
Born August 1974. Dubai resident, Representative of Okami Foundation
 He transformed from a poor salaryman with 6 million yen in debt to developing a unique method of earning 300 million yen annually on his own.
He relocated from Singapore to Dubai in 2022 and engages in cryptocurrency and real estate investments. Author of 6 books.

section1.subtitle: Cryptocurrency Compatible OKAMICARD
section1.title:
World's Premier
Private
Security Card
section1.feature3:
Direct payment without converting
to fiat currency

features.title: Partnered with VISA, Usable Worldwide
features.description: Partnered with international brand VISA for global usage. Through VISA partnership, dining and shopping are available at over 150 million stores worldwide.

features.title: Payment Possible with All Cryptocurrencies
features.description: Okami Card is a credit card that allows cryptocurrency payments. Compatible with subscription payments such as rent and utilities, which are difficult with debit cards. Starting with Bitcoin and Ethereum, we plan to gradually support all major altcoins.

features.title: Manage All Coins with Okami Wallet
features.description: Okami Wallet features high-performance security. Manage all coins in one wallet, avoiding the risk of losing login information.

features.title: No Credit Check Required, No Annual Fee
features.description: No annual fee, a credit card that can use cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.

features.title: Withdraw Fiat Currency from ATMs Worldwide
features.description: Anytime, anywhere, withdraw the local currency in cash from ATMs around the world.

features.title: Cashless Payment Without Card
features.description: Cashless payment possible without the card.

socialContributionSection.title:
The More You Use,
The More You Contribute to Society
socialContributionSection.description: Okami Card is <accent>a social contribution card where everyday payments directly support animal protection</accent>. A portion of transaction fees is donated to <accent>rescue activities that save approximately 11,000 animals from euthanasia annually</accent>. These efforts have been highly recognized, receiving <accent>certificates of appreciation and awards from multiple private organizations and Governor Yoshimura of Osaka Prefecture</accent>.
socialContributionSection.highlight1: Part of transaction fees donated to animal protection and charitable activities
socialContributionSection.highlight2: Anyone can contribute to society effortlessly just by using the card

expoPartnerSection.title: Official Partner Promoting Okami Project to the World
expoPartnerSection.description: At the 2025 World Exposition (Expo 2025 Osaka, Kansai), we were <accent>selected as an official partner of the Osaka Healthcare Pavilion</accent>. <accent>During the expo, we held three collaborative events with celebrities, renowned artists, and influencers, promoting the Okami Project to over 29 million visitors</accent>.
expoPartnerSection.highlight1: Official Partner of Expo 2025 Osaka, Kansai
expoPartnerSection.highlight2: Promoting new forms of payment and social contribution to the world

cryptoSection.title:
Listed on MEXC, Major Global Cryptocurrency Exchange,
and Partnered with Domestic Listed Companies
cryptoSection.description: Okami Coin (OKM) was <accent>listed on MEXC in February 2025</accent>, one of the world's leading cryptocurrency exchanges with over 36 million registered users. Furthermore, with <accent>adoption as shareholder benefits at ABC Corporation (Tokyo Stock Exchange Standard Market)</accent> and <accent>partnership with BLOCKSMITH & Co.</accent>, we continue advancing collaborations with leading domestic and international companies to develop initiatives for broader recognition and value creation for our investors.
cryptoSection.highlight2: Adopted as shareholder benefits at ABC Corporation (Tokyo Stock Exchange Standard Market)

section1.title:
Okami Coin Required for
Okami Card Usage
section1.description: To use the Okami Card, you need Okami Coin (OKM). OKM used for card payments is <accent>burned (incinerated) through an adopted mechanism</accent>, gradually reducing the market supply. As daily card usage increases, OKM consumption and burning progress, resulting in a <accent>design that is expected to potentially lead to future price appreciation through improved supply-demand balance</accent>.
section1.highlight2: Design expected to potentially lead to future price appreciation through improved supply-demand balance

section2.title:
Okami Card Fees at
Industry-Leading Low Rates!
section2.description: The main revenue source for the Okami Project is not transaction fees, but <accent>growth in market capitalization from holding 70% of the total OKM coin issuance</accent>. Therefore, <accent>card transaction fees achieve industry-leading low rates of "1.0% to"</accent> in the cryptocurrency card industry. Note that fees vary depending on card rank (GREEN/GOLD/PLATINUM/BLACK, etc.).
section2.highlight1: Growth in market capitalization from holding 70% of total Okami Coin (OKM) issuance
section2.highlight2: Card transaction fees achieve industry-leading low rates of "1.0% to"
section2.feeNote: * VISA fees apply in addition to the above fees

scratchSection.title:
Okami Scratch:
The More You Use,
The More Chances to Win Premium Prizes
scratchSection.description: The "Okami Scratch" program, available based on Okami Card usage, <accent>adopts a mechanism where your chances of winning increase the more you use the card</accent>. Get scratches through daily payments and enjoy chances to win <accent>premium prizes including luxury goods, special experiences, and exclusive benefits</accent>. Excitement grows with every payment, and as you enjoy using the card, value and benefits accumulate—this is the unique reward program of Okami Card.
scratchSection.highlight1: Mechanism adopted where chances increase the more you use the card
scratchSection.highlight2: Chances to win premium prizes including luxury goods, special experiences, and exclusive benefits

goodsSection.title:
Promoting Okami Brand to
All Generations Through
Original Merchandise
goodsSection.description: Through the development of original merchandise including apparel, accessories, and lifestyle goods, the Okami Project <accent>promotes the Okami brand's worldview and message</accent> to a wide range of generations from children to adults. With products that naturally blend into daily life while maintaining design quality and character appeal, we expand connections with fans while working toward <accent>brand recognition and value creation as a globally beloved brand</accent>.
goodsSection.highlight1: Promoting the Okami brand's worldview and message
goodsSection.highlight2: Brand recognition and value creation as a globally beloved brand

messageSection.title: Message from the Representative
messageSection.message1: Bitcoin has grown approximately 10-fold in price over the past five years, recording an astounding annual average growth rate of approximately 70-80%. The cryptocurrency market has now become an entity that significantly changes the world's financial structure, and major payment companies such as VISA and Mastercard are once again focusing on blockchain and cryptocurrency payments from the perspectives of faster cross-border payments, improved security, and inflation hedging.
messageSection.message2: By utilizing blockchain, security costs can be reduced to less than 1/10,000 of traditional methods, realizing a more robust security and borderless payment environment. In a market environment with an annual average growth rate of 88%, there is even the possibility that asset value will continue to grow despite usage. This is the innovation of cryptocurrency credit cards.
messageSection.message3: In this growing field, the Okami Project makes it our <accent>mission to realize a "system where support is generated just by using it"</accent> by combining animal protection with payment infrastructure. With the trust earned from the world through business partnerships and adoptions with listed companies such as KLab and GFA, and achievements as an official Expo partner, we promote the "infrastructure of donations" through blockchain, aiming to <accent>realize a world where the future of people, animals, and children becomes kinder and richer</accent>.
messageSection.highlight1: Mission to realize a "system where support is generated just by using it"
messageSection.highlight2: Realizing a world where the future of people, animals, and children becomes kinder and richer

feature1.title: Direct payment without fiat currency conversion
feature1.description: The Okami Card is linked to a dedicated wallet that can store all cryptocurrencies including Dogecoin and Shiba Inu Coin, allowing direct payment without converting to your country's fiat currency.

feature2.title: AirDrop feature with premium benefits for higher-tier cards
feature2.description: OKAMI CARD features an AirDrop function, with higher-tier cards offering more advantageous and beneficial terms of use.

feature3.title: Built-in value appreciation mechanism
feature3.description: The more the card is used worldwide, the fewer Okami Coins remain in circulation, increasing the value per coin.

section5.title: Merit
section5.subtitle: Higher tiers offer better and more advantageous terms
section5.description: Coins increase like interest through the AirDrop function!

section6.title: REASON WHY
section6.subtitle: 5 Key Points Only OKAMI CARD Can Deliver

reason1.title:
Manage All Coins with
Okami Wallet
reason1.description: Traditional wallets required multiple wallets depending on the type of coins you hold, but with the Okami Card dedicated wallet, everything is complete in one.
reason1.feature1: Manage all coins in one wallet
reason1.feature2: Reduced risk of losing login information

reason2.title:
Partnership with International Brands
Usable Worldwide!
reason2.description: Through partnerships with the most famous international brands, dining and shopping are possible all over the world.

reason3.title:
Cash Withdrawals in Japanese Yen
Available at ATMs Nationwide
reason3.description: With the card, you can withdraw Japanese yen in cash from ATMs all over Japan anytime, anywhere.

reason4.title:
Compatible with Cashless Payments
Such as Apple Pay!
reason4.description: By registering the card on your smartphone in advance, cashless payments are possible without the card. The wallet and card fit into one smartphone, making it very convenient to use.

reason5.title: Highest Compliance Standards
reason5.description: OKAMI CARD is operated by an organization established, licensed and regulated in Hong Kong, and is a legal financial product that executes real-time blockchain transactions.

section7.title:
Unlimited Settlement Amount +

The titanium card [Nihon Okami Card]
whose acquisition method remains shrouded in mystery
